attributes.conditions: As a Platinum Card Member, you can receive Marriott BonvoyÂ® Gold Elite Status without meeting any stay requirements. Enrollment required. Terms and limitations apply. Must maintain active cardmembership to retain status.
benefitsList: Earn 25% bonus points on eligible stays

attributes.enrollmentInstructions: Enrollment required through American Express benefits platform. Must link existing Marriott Bonvoy account or create new account to receive status.
